display_long_description:
Echo Tag is a thrilling multiplayer stealth-action game where sound is your greatest weapon—and your biggest risk. Set in a pitch-black arena where vision is stripped away, players must rely solely on audio cues and echolocation to hunt or evade their opponents.

Each player emits sonar-like pings to reveal the world around them, momentarily illuminating the environment with sound waves. But every ping gives away your position—so timing, strategy, and nerves of steel are everything. Will you risk making noise to see, or stay silent and hidden in the dark?

Play as a seeker or a runner in high-stakes rounds of tag, with customizable characters, dynamic maps, and game modes ranging from 1v1 duels to chaotic 6-player chases. With its unique audio-driven mechanics and tense, competitive gameplay, Echo Tag offers a fresh take on stealth and multiplayer action.

Whether you're the predator or the prey, in Echo Tag, the darkness listens.
